name: formact
description: Context for React form components with validation

scripts.build:js: cross-env BABEL_ENV=browser-cjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore test.js
scripts.build: yarn build:clean && yarn build:js && yarn build:flow
scripts.start: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test babel src --out-dir lib  --watch --ignore test.js

author: Diogo Perillo
